headline: Investors Are Overly Discounting PG&E's Financial And Legal Protections
summary: PG&E is now trading slightly below 10x 2026 earnings vs. peers trading above 15x. Are investors overly discounting the financial and legal protections? Find out.

headline: Third Point Q4 2024 Investor Letter
summary:
During Q4 2024, Third Point returned 9.1% in the flagship Offshore Fund, and for the 
year returned 24.2%.  Click here to read the full letter.
